text: @Mandoline_Blue He does contradict himself - on the one hand hot weather could reduce Covid-19 - on the other, haven’t we had the best couple of months for sunshine in living history?  & he is right that there could be cultural advantages - if people are told clearly what to do, they do it!

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
